name: TGC Forum - DarkTextured
description:
A dark theme for The Game Creators Forum.

FEATURES:
* Floating navigation bar
* Expanded text boxes
* De-cluttered
* Consistent, clear and readable colour scheme.
* Use of transparency and shadows for a range of subtle effects.
